sentences: Wang Nanjun (Chinese: 王南钧), known professionally as Krystian Wang, is a Chinese singer, songwriter, dancer and model.
He participated in the Chinese reality shows Super Boy  member of Now United.
ex trainee in Youth With You 3.
Biography ==
Wang was born into a performing arts family in Beijing, China.
His father is a military actor and his mother is a model and  theater actress.
As a teenager, aged 15, Wang went to study alone in New York.

sentences: 2022–present: Solo Career =
On January 10, 2022, Krystian released the debut of her solo career with EP eponymous Krystian with two songs, Divo and Lucifer.
